Sentencas: The decrease in cathodic polarization resistance is crucial for the development of advanced solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Interfacial energy barrier: A crucial factor affecting cathodic polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This can be achieved by using functional ceramic catalysts for enhancing the oxygen reduction reaction.
Titulo: Interfacial energy barrier: A crucial factor affecting cathodic polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition to the bulk and surface properties of the catalysts, the cathode/electrolyte interfacial energy barrier also affects the cathodic polarization resistance of SOFCs.
Titulo: Interfacial energy barrier: A crucial factor affecting cathodic polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Accordingly, in this study, cells with different interface structures were designed and tested to determine the effect of the interface on the cell performance.
Titulo: Interfacial energy barrier: A crucial factor affecting cathodic polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell with the cathode/electrolyte interface formed by employing Nd1/2Ba1/2Co1/3Fe1/3Mn1/3O3-delta as the cathode and Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 as the electrolyte exhibited an interfacial polarization resistance of 0.12 omega cm(2) at 750 degrees C, which was 69.8% of the total cathodic polarization resistance.
Titulo: Interfacial energy barrier: A crucial factor affecting cathodic polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By comparison, the cell with the cathode/electrolyte interface formed by employing Nd1/2Ba1/2Co1/3Fe1/3Mn1/3O3-delta as the cathode and La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.2O3 as the electrolyte demonstrated a decreased in the cathodic polarization resistance from 0.140 to 0.088 omega cm(2) at 750 degrees C. Therefore, different interfacial energy barriers resulted in variable oxygen anion diffusions through the cathode/electrolyte heterogeneous interface.
Titulo: Interfacial energy barrier: A crucial factor affecting cathodic polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The above-mentioned findings can provide useful data for the design and development of high-performance SOFCs.
Titulo: Interfacial energy barrier: A crucial factor affecting cathodic polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cells
